citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:55pm on
03-APR-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility, and went to the front door a residence. A family member answered the door.
They stated that the licensee was not available and they would prefer for the licensee to be present at the time of
the inspection.
